channel.title: Sonny bill 9s autotyper

item.title: Sonny bill 9s autotyper
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

hi ive just made this script it took me 10 miniutes the script looks a bit weird but it works you get a choice between 11 different messages and the wait time??its my first autotyper and my shortest script but still it works so please download and post reports
here is the script for my idiot friend that cant see the attachment

//sonny bill 9s autotalker program autotalker; {.include srl/srl.scar} var sent : Integer; const //fill out your messages below then click the corresponding button to //type the message on rs2 waittime=0;//how long to wait m1=''; m2=''; m3=''; m4=''; m5=''; m6=''; m7=''; m8=''; m9=''; m10=''; m11=''; procedure report; begin cleardebug; writeln('--------------------------------------------'); writeln('you have sent ' + IntToStr(sent) + ' messages'); writeln('thank you for using sonny bill 9s autotalker'); writeln('--------------------------------------------'); end; procedure typer; begin typesend(m1); wait(waittime); typesend(m2); wait(waittime); typesend(m3); wait(waittime); typesend(m4); wait(waittime); typesend(m5); wait(waittime); typesend(m6); wait(waittime); typesend(m7); wait(waittime); typesend(m8); wait(waittime); typesend(m9); wait(waittime); typesend(m10); wait(waittime); typesend(m11); wait(waittime); Sent:= sent + 11; end; begin setupsrl; cleardebug; activateclient; typer; report; repeat until(false) end.
and here is the attachment for non-idiots

Read full topic
